comments:
Build ID: I20070601-1539

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Setup a C++ Project - empty, Linux gcc
2. Add a folder, click advanced, link to rse folder on a linux system
3. Goto External tools setup
4. Setup an external tool:
   For location:
   click Browse Workspace ...
   navigate to the rse folder where the tool lives
   click ok
   For Working Directory:
   click Browse Workspace ...
   navigate to the rse folder where the tool lives
   click ok
5. Click apply in the external tools dialog

Now attempt to run the external tool.


More information:
When you attempt to run the external tool or go back into the external tools dialog, this comes out in the log:
